raw_body: Dearly beloved husband of Vianthi, loving father of Shehani, father-in-law of Sanjaya and brother of Nimal and Lal. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour. Cortege leaves A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour on 22nd April 2024 at 4.00 p.m. for burial at 4.30 p.m. at the Roman Catholic Section, General Cemetery, Borella.
